title: Insertion Sort
description: Insertion sort builds the sorted array one element at a time by repeatedly picking the next element and inserting it into its correct position.
keyPoints: Efficient for small or nearly sorted arrays.
pseudocode:
1. Iterate from the second element to the end.
2. Compare the current element with those before it.
3. Shift larger elements one position to the right.
4. Insert the current element in the correct position.
